title: WTB T206 Cobb Red Portrait with the following tougher backs
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Cobb Red Portrait with the following tougher backs
posts.post_content:
Im interested in a T206 cobb red port with any of the following backs..(ive seen the ones on ebay, not interested in those)

please email me at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url] if you have any of these you would be willing to sell or trade.
  * AB 350
  * cycle 350 
  * cycle 460
  * sov 350
  * sov 460
  * Carolina Brights
  * EPDG
  * Pied 460 Fact 42


Jamie

Jamie,

I have a Cobb red Tolstoi '3' and Piedmont 42 raw (vg/ex+).

Would rather trade than receive cash....feel free to present trade offer if interested.

[url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]
Jaime, a back run on the Cobb Red? Very ambitious! Good luck. I wish that I could help, but all I have is a Lenox, and I know you already have one.  :)
